title: The Blackpool Serial Killer: Episode 122
itunes:subtitle: Just how well do you know your family and friends and what they could be capable of doing? The podcast this week looks at a man who killed three people.  A 'normal' (whatever that means) guy who was popular, had a range of interests and had a broad cir...
content:encoded:
Just how well do you know your family and friends and what they could be capable of doing? The podcast this week looks at a man who killed three people.  A 'normal' (whatever that means) guy who was popular, had a range of interests and had a broad circle of friends.  But when under stress in life, he went to a very dark place and carried out the most dreadful of crimes.

1, An excellent source of information on Blackpool Crime I referred to in this episode is below:  

https://blackpoolcrime.wordpress.com/

2, Please buy tickets for my event with top author Geoffrey Wansell on 26 March in London here 'Inside the mind of a serial killer':

http://bit.ly/uktruecrimekillerstalk

3, Other links mentioned in the show:

www.uktruecrime.com         

https://m.facebook.com/groups/1479468325433430
